reviewText: Purchased as a gift for a family member who's an aspiring bassist.  Recipient seems to be happy with it.
There isn't a lot of technical stuff, but Nathan's experiences and stories of working and collaborating with other artists make this definitely worth my time.

Extremely disappointed. This DVD is only
for use by those interested in playing
base guitar. I had to give it away so
it was a monetary loss to me.
P Dais
I had to replace my VHS tape. I like Nathan's style and teaching method.  He covers a lot of material quickly.  Be prepared to spend time working on each section of the DVD.

this DVD is awesome he uses very good technique and has a dynamic style it takes you step-by-step to perfect your style.his message on how to practice create a whole new way of looking at bass playing.

I bought this for my husband and he has watched numerous times and lives it. There are various bass techniques shown such as playing chords (sounds awesome on a bass) and rock, gospel and soul. We love this item.

Do not buy this...total waste of money, unless you want to watch someone play very fast with zero explanations about what is going on.  On the other hand, if you want to watch a dude play stuff really fast then act like any idiot should be able to do same, this is the DVD for you....
